titles.title: A bill to recognize the National Aviation Cadet Museum of the United States.
National Aviation Cadet Museum of the United States Recognition Act
National Aviation Cadet Museum of the United States Recognition Act
National Aviation Cadet Museum of the United States Recognition Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
National Aviation Cadet Museum of the United States Recognition Act
This bill recognizes the Aviation Cadet Museum in Eureka Springs, Arkansas, as the National Aviation Cadet Museum of the United States.
